hero.title: Beautiful, weird and free
hero.text: Put your mark on the web with simple storytelling, hosting and sharing tools that let you express yourself on your term.

facets.title: Your story, your voice, your stuff
facets.text: Remember when you could tell your story on the web without giving your info away? We're bringing that web back.

facets.title: Show the world, or don't...your choice
facets.text: Wild Web lets you publish to the open web, share with groups, or keep things private.

facets.title: Storify it
facets.text: Tell your story with the content you love. Use the flexible story editor to bring in any content and put together a shareable narrative that your friends can interact with.

facets.title: Wild and free
facets.text: Want to keep your web wild? We've got you covered with tons of plugins to style every aspect of your story.
